text: The Jewel of the Nile is a 1985 American adventure romantic comedy movie directed by Lewis Teague and a sequel to the 1984 movie Romancing the Stone. It stars Michael Douglas, Kathleen Turner, Danny DeVito and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. == Other websites == * * Category:1985 romantic comedy movies Category:1985 adventure movies Category:1980s sequel movies Category:American adventure movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American sequel movies Category:Movies set in Africa Category:Movies set in deserts Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Lewis Teague
title: The Jewel of the Nile
